MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY5 postcode area of Lochgelly. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:47pm. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to complete further investigations on the electrical network affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
